sentences.en: A constrained growth algorithm of simple polygon triangulation is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种简单多边形三角剖分的约束生长算法.

sentences.en: A polygon with ten sides is a decagon.
sentences.cn: 十条边的形状叫十边形。

sentences.en: Add the unit UPhysics 2 DPolygonTool , the segmentation of an arbitrary polygon ( triangulation ).
sentences.cn: 添加了单元UPhysics2DPolygonTool,实现任意多边形的细分化 ( 三角化 ).

sentences.en: Although the bounding box is a polygon defining the area represented for the user, I simplify and use one point of this data.
sentences.cn: 尽管这个边界框是一个用于定义表示用户的区域的多边形，但我简化并使用这些数据的一个点。

sentences.en: Basic graphics algorithms, including linear, round, oval, rectangle, polygon.
sentences.cn: 基本绘图算法, 包括直线, 圆, 椭圆, 长方形, 多边形.

sentences.en: Best way to "match" an array of polygon vertices to another?
sentences.cn: 最佳方法“匹配”多边形顶点到另一个数组?。

sentences.en: Boundaries of the polygon may extend to infinity.
sentences.cn: 多角形的边界可以延伸到无穷远处.

sentences.en: However, in other games I want to hide the polygon structure.
sentences.cn: 但是，在其他游戏里我想要隐藏多边形结构。

sentences.en: If the horizontal line drawn is aligned with a polygon vertex, then only the segments that are below the line are counted.
sentences.cn: 如果所绘制的水平线与一个多边形顶点对齐，那么只会计算位于该线下方的部分。

sentences.en: Look at the curvature plot of the polygon data.
sentences.cn: 看看曲率的图谋,多边形的数据.

sentences.en: MFC coding method used to achieve the cutting of arbitrary polygon.
sentences.cn: MFC的编码方法用于实现切割任意多边形.

sentences.en: No point cloud offsetdata could auto - generated the STL polygon surface.
sentences.cn: 点云无分层自动生成三维实体图形(三角网格面).

sentences.en: Polygon Button 015015 Displays a cross - hair pointer that you use to draw a polygon.
sentences.cn: 显示一细十字指针,来绘制多边形.

sentences.en: The circle has greater area than a regular polygon of the same perimeter.
sentences.cn: 正的面积比同样周长的正多边形的面积大.

sentences.en: The color is used for the area covered by a (multi-)polygon or the line of a (multi-)linestring.
sentences.cn: 颜色用于显示一个（多）多边形所覆盖的区域或一个（多）行字符串的行。

sentences.en: The frequency polygon is simpler than its histogram counterpart.
sentences.cn: 频率多边形比直方图更简单.

sentences.en: This can obviously reduce your polygon counts quite a lot.
sentences.cn: 它显然能减少你庞大的多边形数量.

sentences.en: This is a polygon cutting procedure is a classic computer graphics algorithms.
sentences.cn: 这是多边形裁剪的程序,是计算机图形学的经典算法.

sentences.en: To achieve the Circle, line, rectangle, polygon, color images, delete, zooming.
sentences.cn: 实现了画圆, 线, 矩形, 多边形, 颜色,镜像, 删除, 缩放.

sentences.en: What is the perimeter of this polygon?
sentences.cn: 这个多边形的周长是多少?

words.tran_cn: [数] 多边形的；[数] 多角形的

trans.tran_en: a flat shape with three or more sides
